website_summaries.verdict: This pump provides an uncomplicated way of pumping without any cords and works quietly and quickly.
pros: Comes with simple instructions and is easy to transport
Has soft and comfortable silicone covering
Has few parts, so it’s simple to clean
Ergonomic handle makes it easy on hands to ensure maximum milk is pumped
cons: Flange only comes in one size and isn’t removable

customer_reviews.title: Best for me!
customer_reviews.text: I do not understand why so many people dislike this pump! I went through two others before I came to this one and now it is the only one I use. My son is now 5 months old. I have been working and pumping since he was 2 months old. I discovered that this manual pump produced the most milk in the least amount of time when combined with compressions. I will add that I have rather large breasts and nipples and other pumps were just not a good fit, but this one was perfect for me!
customer_reviews.author: BrE-Reader

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and did not last
customer_reviews.text: Update: after originally giving this pump a good review, i felt it was only fair i update on my experience. After just over a month, there is no more suction from the pump. I've tried everything to get it to work but it barely feels like a tickle when i try to use it. It's disappointing to know that a product with so much initial promise has failed miserably, especially when needed most. I've resorted to finally splurging and investing in an electric pump. It's true when they say "buy cheap; buy twice". I no longer recommend this pump.
customer_reviews.author: Belles

customer_reviews.title: Awful pump
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a medela and Lansinoh handpump and loved them. Figured this one would be just as good so I ordered it instead of spending a little extra and immediately regretted it. It doesn’t pull the nipple out far enough and when I let go of the handle part the suction slowly lets up instead of right away. Hard to explain but you can’t really control the speed of this pump. Better off hand expressing. I threw away the pump part and kept the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and milk.
customer_reviews.text: To be blunt, this is a piece of crap. Don't waste your time and money on it! I bought it as a backup to my electric and for times I didn't want to haul that whole bag around. I've used other manuals and they have been efficient and easy. Everytime I use this one, the grey piece that holds onto the top comes out of place. It is so frustrating! I've only used it a few times but it has resulted in time and milk lost. (Because it leaks too, yay.)
customer_reviews.author: Adele

customer_reviews.title: I love this pump
customer_reviews.text: I love this pump. It is great for traveling. I can easily bring it along and use in the car or where we are staying instead of bringing my electric pump. Your hand typically will get tired from pumping, but that is normal. It is easy to take apart and clean. I don't worry about any parts staying wet as they all come apart and are open and I can leave it out drying until I need it next. Suction is great and my daughter loves Nuk nipples so this was a great purchase for us. Bottle is cute as well. I personally don't like the silicone guard and just use it without.
customer_reviews.author: tmcondie

customer_reviews.title: A simple and quick pump!!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use, and powerful suction!! I have been using an electric double pump (Lansinoh smartpump) and this is a nice break from all the tubing, the cord, and double pumping. It's super quick and easy for on the go, and the bottle of corse comes with a lid so you can store your expressed milk untill you make it back home. Really also love the silicone flange cover, which makes it way more comfortable than a basic, plastic flange.
customer_reviews.author: Acovo

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and Painful
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses the NUK bottles well, so when my old manual pump stopped working well I decided to order this one. The cheaper price should've been a clue not to. The suction is so strong that there is bruising on my nipples. The top piece keeps shifting out of place and there is a very loud 'click' when it re-seats itself, enough to wake a sleeping baby. The handle is in a fixed position and isn't adjustable, it's incredibly uncomfortable to hold. It may work better if you have larger hands but mine keep cramping up.
customer_reviews.author: bpaul

customer_reviews.title: Silicone guard causes loss of suction
customer_reviews.text: Faster than my Medela electric pump. I have a problem with the silicone guard though. After just a few minutes of use the silicone stops holding suction and no amount of repositioning solves the problem. I have to remove the silicone to regain suction and finish pumping which if I am using it a lot can lead to sore nipples from lack of the silicone guard. Over all would buy again, wish that it worked just a little better though.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: 28mm flange size? Decent “quickie”. Hand express the rest so as to not lost supply
customer_reviews.text: My hand gets tired. Suction power is decent but be prepared to hand express out a good amount after you use this. Good for quick relief. It’s about a 28mm flange size. I use a 15mm flange with my spectra(Maymom is awesome!) and even that is 2mm too big. I might be able to fit it with a fit me 15mm flange insert after I get my freemie products but I won’t know until I get them and try them out.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Good, non painful suction
customer_reviews.text: There are time I use this over my electric. It’s great for taking on the go. It’s not necessary the smallest one out there but I have tested some and this is definitely the one to get. This has actual suction and a place for the milk to go that isn’t going to spill all over.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Prewett

customer_reviews.title: Great pump
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great pump! I get much more breast milk from this one than electric ones I’ve used. Only down side is that you need a straw cleaner to get some of the areas clean. Small price to pay for such a great pump
customer_reviews.author: Larrissa

customer_reviews.title: Good for occasional use.
customer_reviews.text: My 5 star rating does NOT mean this is the perfect product. It means that *for the price,* this is an excellent product. This is not ideal for everyday use, and will never replace a good electric pump if you pump regularly. It has a slight design flaw where the top part doesn't stay where it should. However, if you are an exclusive pumper and only have an electric pump, something like this is a necessity, (which I learned the night we lost electricity for 10 hours).
customer_reviews.author: B. W.

customer_reviews.title: One of my best buys
customer_reviews.text: Still holding up. I don't like that it has plastic parts but I haven't found a pump that doesn't. Used at least 100 times. I love the silicone cover that goes against your breast. The ones with just plastic are so uncomfortable, especially for those first few months of soreness and engorgement. I don't pump for work so I only used this for when I was engorged or my son didn't fully empty at a feeding. 6 months later it served its purpose. After using this, I would never buy a pump without a silicone cover that suctions against you so you don't have to press so hard against your breast to create closure.
customer_reviews.author: An Honest Review

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Buying this was a major mistake!!! It's really hard to get the pump to create suction. I had to have it pushng hard again the breast which is super uncomfortable. Then if I pumped a little faster than a snail the pumping part would fall apart and I would have to fix it. Save your time and money, just buy a medella.
customer_reviews.author: Emilia

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived USED
customer_reviews.text: YES USED!! It was disgusting, had dried milk on the horn, and in the bottle! Was not even washed! I threw it away. Complete waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Couvillion Family

customer_reviews.title: broke after a few uses
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hand pump to use while traveling but it broke before my trip. It was easy to use for the most part. The suction was decent and it got a letdown fairly quickly. The silicon insert made pumping a little more comfortable. After a few days of use unfortunately the handle piece broke and is now unusable. Each use was from 2-5 minutes of pumping.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey L.

customer_reviews.title: This hand pump works great! I wanted something to keep in the car ...
customer_reviews.text: This hand pump works great! I wanted something to keep in the car if I was in a pinch. I am impressed by how much milk I can express very quickly with this pump, it works even better than my electric pump. I think it would be hard to use this as my everyday pump, but it is definitely nice to have!
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Too hard to squeeze. Would not purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to rhe reviews. I can barely squeeze the handle. It will be very hard and awkward for someone with small hands. Foe the price of $12...it was worth a shot. It does NOT fit all Nuk brand bottles which was another reason I bought it. I have wider mouth Nuk bottles. Will not fit those. So now I have the pump and 1 bottle (that it came with) to use with it. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Nice pump easy to use and wash
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pump. Easy to use and wash. One issue is when pulling it off, milk will pool around the lip of the flange and it spills out. This is a waste of milk. The silicone skin on the flange too saved my pumping experience while using the ameda pump bit fits the ameda flange (it's big but works) and makes it more comfortable and helps with letdown. Manual pump can help with fully emptying and assisting with letdown.
customer_reviews.author: LeyaRuth

customer_reviews.title: Best hand pump ever!
customer_reviews.text: I far preferred this pump over my mechanical, hospital grade pump. With my son born at 27 weeks I had to pump for the three months he was in the NICU, and I even used this while driving once! This hand pump was an honest lifesaver for me!
customer_reviews.author: JBridges

customer_reviews.title: Not so much
customer_reviews.text: Similar to my other manual pumps. Hardly any suction. The silicone piece does provide some comfort for larger breasts but this is not working for me. The membrane is super floppy and while pumping the handle makes loud noises so my baby kept waking up. Breastfeeding is already a struggle and this is not helping. I has to use two hands and barely got a few drops before I gave up.
customer_reviews.author: CMaria

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It is very good quality BUT it doesn't really work for me. A pump is supposed to suck and release and this pump sucks very good but it doesn't release almost at all! So it like stays really sucked in and it kinda hurts just doesn't feel right and doesn't get much out of me.
customer_reviews.author: CDC

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine before it broke.
customer_reviews.text: The pivot for the handle broke the third time we used it. It's still attached on one side and sorta works.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Good enough for occasional use but the gray part comes out of place every pump and sometimes makes loud click noises. Also milk pools and leaks out the flange. Wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Pumpin' aint easy but its necessary
customer_reviews.text: I don't really like pumping, but this manual pump is great for me because I have...ahem...silver dollars. So my other manual pump with it's hard plastic cup that may have been too small for me was more painful. This pump has a bigger soft cup so it's more comfortable. It's not going to give you the suction of an electric but it gets the job done. Easy to use and clean. Works great for a part time pumper like me.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Best hand pump I've tried
customer_reviews.text: Best hand pump I've used so far. All others I've tried have pinched me or not fit in the flange nip zone. This is very easy to use, there's a dip for your thumb so it's easy to hold and as I've said it doesn't pinch. It doesn't squeak either which is a huge plus. I direct latch on demand and still have to pump 6-8x a day with my medela PISA and this gives me the freedom to not have to lug the PISA around, or even use it in its place a few times a day. happy I have this a go, I'll probably order another Just to keep in my bag
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for on the go.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this breast pump. I actually ended up using it more than my electric pump. I used it on the go too.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money on this product
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money on this product. I tried it the first day I bought it and was very disappointed. The hand pump doesn’t help with expressing milk, and seems to come apart. I was looking forward to using this at night or during morning let down, but it was so bad that I quit trying to use it after the second day. Does not suction well, highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time getting good suction & therefore pumping milk out. Maybe I just assemble it wrong. The silicone sheild was soft. I wouldn't recommend it though. I just didn't feel it was strong enough
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Good product had some issues with pushing the handle to hard but it worked great i needed one for on the go and i love how to bottle is attached. No hassle of dumping into a bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie H

customer_reviews.title: great car pump
customer_reviews.text: I keep this manual pump in my car in case I am ever without my baby or just full after a feeding or if we are out and about and someone else wants to feed her. Great backup pump!
customer_reviews.author: michele

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I like that it has the ability to be taken apart completely for cleaning but I wasn't able to get much milk out with it. Hurt my skin more than it pumped milk
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: It gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I prefer my electric pump over this one. It gets the job done in a pinch, but I feel that I get more out with my electric. The company is super helpful though. I had to reach out to Nuk with an issue with this pump & they got right back to me and helped me. Although I prefer my electric, this is not a bad pump for others that may prefer a hand pump.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: worth it for the price box states occasional pump
customer_reviews.text: i received the package sealed in what appears original box. there were some brown grass looking pieces on pump and cover, beneift of the doubt they look like little scraps of cardboard which is understandable i will clean parts before using. in have not used the pump yet but some of the reviews left had mafe me skeptical to buy and so far im ok with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: a.

customer_reviews.title: Must have for ease!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I don't get very much out but i don't with an electric pump either, I get the most if it's hand expressed. BUT it is definitely a time saver being able to pump with one hand and have my other hand free. Dispite other reviews that I have read before purchasing, it is very easy to clean and comes apart easily/ goes back together easily.
customer_reviews.author: Justin nelson

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: This just didn't work at all for me. I was so excited to order it after reading the great reviews but it never worked well. It was painful and pumping was difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and cut my pumping time in half
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and has great suction. I pump out more than i do when i use my electric pump. Has cut my pumping time in half!
customer_reviews.author: Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Popping sounds and Pain
customer_reviews.text: The pump is super annoying and difficult to maneuver. A popping sound happens all the time, if it’s not popping it is generally not working. Painful pump shields that don’t extend far enough so it catches the nipple on the lip of the silicon. Not worth it. I was waiting for my electric pump, and now that I have it I am throwing this junk out.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use and keeps breaking
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work well at all, my milk leaks around the insert and the top part keeps unseating from the top. I'll be looking for another manual pump.
customer_reviews.author: ASB

customer_reviews.title: Seriously a great manual pump
customer_reviews.text: Seriously a great manual pump. I’m busty so pumps are a pain sometimes but this works great. Perfect for on the go or if you just plan to pump here and there.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Nope. Just nope.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to take on a quick overnight trip to keep comfortable. Manually expressing in the shower was easier and more effective. Way too big for my hand. Could only use for a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: KatyinME

customer_reviews.title: Mehhh
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this pump. I had the hardest time using it. No matter what I did, I could not get the suction right. I also had trouble with the top popping off whenever I did get the suction to start working. Much preferred the free one given to me at the hospital.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Lee

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Super impressed with this little pump. I have a newborn and a toddler boy under 2 who takes up a lot of my time. Hooking up to my fancy pump took way too much time and kept me stuck in one area of my house. This little pump can sit right next to me on the couch and makes everything soo much easier!!
customer_reviews.author: Sara S.

customer_reviews.title: It served its purpose when I was in a pinch ...
customer_reviews.text: It served its purpose when I was in a pinch on vacation, but I much preferred my Medela hand pump. This one did not fit well and was uncomfortable to use. Also, a little more difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.author: KenjiAnn

customer_reviews.title: And this pump is great as it pumps directly into the cup
customer_reviews.text: We have used NUK learner cups with all my kids, never bottles. And this pump is great as it pumps directly into the cup. My first manual but from what I'm seen so far(just got it today but already pumped with a fairly immediate milk response-much faster than my Medela electric) it appears to be a great unit. Bought this for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: SuzanneDeLorenzo

customer_reviews.title: Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife. We have spectra S2 advance that works really well but its not handy. So thought of buying a manual one also. It works well that medela manual pump. Suction is powerful. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: BSINGH

customer_reviews.title: Overall good.
customer_reviews.text: Few minor drawbacks but over all good. Love the rubber massager insert, easy to disassemble and clean. The overall design is good other than I kinda wish the handle/lever was on the other side, and I wish the funnel was longer for the nipple but not inhibitive. Worth twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loud Popping Noise
customer_reviews.text: It’s only alright. It pumps well enough but the black plastic piece on the top slides up and down and sometimes gets hitched on the white plastic, resulting in a very loud popping noise. Not ideal if you’re trying to pump while baby is sleeping, or nursing on the other side!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: ... just be me i use without and that is better it is also a little bulky but it was ...
customer_reviews.text: Works but soft cushion shield pinches and pulls could just be me i use without and that is better it is also a little bulky but it was cheap and gets milk out also is not compatible with nuk simply natural bottles
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Good for on the good pumping
customer_reviews.text: This is a good manual breast pump. It leaks a little from the bottom of where the suction connects to your breast from time to time as you are pumping. It works well for a manual pump but if you are comparing it to an electric one you will be disappointed. It is also easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Javita Person

customer_reviews.title: Efficient & affordable
customer_reviews.text: This is the best manual pump I’ve ever tried 🙌 And way cheaper than the medela one. Super easy to use, very efficient, and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: emjays24

customer_reviews.title: Duckbill
customer_reviews.text: I’m disappointed in this pump. Mainly the fact that there is no way to replace the duckbill attachment. After about 2 months of use it needs to be replaced. It doesn’t have a good suction with a worn out duckbill. No other duckbills fit it and you can’t order one separately. My only option would to rebuy the entire pump and I’m not doing that.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: used to help with  hand expressions waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I use to help aid in hand expression, unfortunately this went from useful to a pain in my ass the top part keeps popping and no longer useful in this method . a waste of my money !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for a short time
customer_reviews.text: I liked this pump at first. It was good for middle of the night engorgement. I have used it maybe 10 times and now it won’t work. The gray silicone valve keeps popping out of the pump handle. There’s no suction at all.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Good for larger boobs, makes a ruckus, uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: It has good suction and is large enough to actually fit unlike some other manual pumps I’ve tried. Those are the only good things about it. It makes a weird loud clicking noise and feels like it is going to rip my nipples off.
customer_reviews.author: MLP

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This was a life saver on a work trip for me!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley H.

customer_reviews.title: It's Okay...
customer_reviews.text: This is not my favorite pump however my son LOVES the bottle that comes with it. Our issue with this pump is that it seems to take an extraordinary amount of effort to get any milk out. The PROS of this pump is that it is easy to clean and comfortable to use, plus the bottle is leak free and my son loves it. The CON is the amount of effort it takes.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY. Go for a more expensive pump because this is a waste it doesnt fit, you have to press hard into yourself to have it tight enough to pump and the actual pump piece slides out with each squeeze so you have to put it back with each squeeze.
customer_reviews.author: Dziana

customer_reviews.title: It worked great, and it's compact enough for me to travel ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the occasional pump when I'm away from my baby for too long, or if he happened to sleep too much and my milk is thrown off. It was exactly what I needed. It worked great, and it's compact enough for me to travel with. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Shar

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and clean. It just didn’t work for me at all.
customer_reviews.author: kyeager

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this pump. It is more effective for me than an electric pump, and the silicone breast shield and ergonomic handle makes it the most comfortable manual pump I've used. Would absolutely recommend to anyone looking for a manual pump!
customer_reviews.author: Kate O.

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Just what i needed during our road trip from Cali to Kentucky! I didn't want to bring the large double electric pump and this is easy to just put in the diaper bag. Cute design!
customer_reviews.author: Darrell

customer_reviews.title: Worked great until...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a backup to my automatic pump but I started to prefer this one. Until it wouldn't stay together. The plunger kept popping out while I was using it. I guess it's not meant to be used daily. I'll be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Almost BROKE my wrist trying to use this one. ...
customer_reviews.text: Almost BROKE my wrist trying to use this one...YUCK ...really hard to use ...as soon as the pump goes back into position ....you have use all your might to start all over...If you do not mind having very sore wrist...this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: SpiritWarrior

customer_reviews.title: Great pump
customer_reviews.text: Loved this pump it helped so much when I had mastitis!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Great pump, not very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED this pump and was devastated when it broke. The handle broke off from the bulb that suctions. I've only been using it for 6 weeks and prefer it to my electric pump-- I can get milk out faster without causing as much pain.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Bellomy

customer_reviews.title: Not for me. ..very painful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to have in the diaper bag when I'm on the go. I used it and it hurt so bad. I just went and bought a pump that is electric but that.yoj can also use batteries with
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Great cheap pump
customer_reviews.text: Really good for a cheap manual pump. Couldn't replace a full size electric pump but it is great for the money, is easy to clean and is easy to travel with.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Kelley

customer_reviews.title: I liked it.
customer_reviews.text: Its the second pump I've used, the first being an electric pump. This one ACTUALLY works and is much more comfortable. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: ElleOGB

customer_reviews.title: I wanted this pump to be useful..
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this pump to be useful... but it wasn't! The silicone insert inside the flange seemed like it would provide a level of comfort, but ended up rubbing in a way that was painful. It was easy to clean and is kind of cute, but ultimately did not provide a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt seem to work as well as my medela hand ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt seem to work as well as my medela hand pump i had in the past. I'm not sure why.
customer_reviews.author: Mel-luv

customer_reviews.title: Not for me...
customer_reviews.text: Okay kind of harsh and doesnt really work for me. I prefer medela. The nuk will hold up longer and is prettier, but it hurt for me and still didnt pump much out.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: somehow it works only sometimes, it did not extract any milk for me
customer_reviews.author: Paw

customer_reviews.title: Get it even if you have an electric pump
customer_reviews.text: This is a life saver. It works really great, you need to make sure it is dry for it to function well. Even if you have an electic pump, I would get this as a spare. It is perfect for nighttime needs.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: great for on the go
customer_reviews.text: great manual pump for on the go. extracts milk super well! ++ comes w nipple so no messy storage transfer
customer_reviews.author: Steve's Overstock

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price and occasional use!
customer_reviews.text: This handy little pump is great when I'm engorged and need to find some relief when I'm not with my little one. Nothing fancy, but gets the job done!
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Garcia

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used it yet . Tried the suction on my belly lol . But my package was done open ! The seal was broke when i got it and the box was damaged so I’m pretty upset about it !
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Love this handy little pump!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pump! I coach track and field so this came in very handy to help release some engorgement while on away meets and not able to use my electric pump. I would totally recommend as a backup pump.
customer_reviews.author: Kati Walsh

customer_reviews.title: NUK Expressive Manual Breastpump is great, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: NUK Expressive Manual Breastpump is great, easy to clean, works well. Possible to use in the car (as a passenger!) but for that an electric one with a car adapter is better.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Carter

customer_reviews.title: it was working great the first few times I used but after about ...
customer_reviews.text: it was working great the first few times I used but after about 10 uses the top part keeps coming off and doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: faye glascor

customer_reviews.title: Great pump
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little pump. Easy to clean. I just bought it cause it was cheap and I wanted to have a back up pump. I would recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: I&N+4

customer_reviews.title: The only one
customer_reviews.text: It’s the pump what really works for me! Strong, easy and good quality for this price. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Does not work well
customer_reviews.text: Did not work well at all. Max I'd get is half once.... I should have been able to get out at least 2 -3 ounces. I had to manually express instead. You get what you pay for I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Brock

customer_reviews.title: Pieces break while using!
customer_reviews.text: This hand pump was AMAZING until about a month of use and the pieces began popping out as I was pumping. The grey piece that pulls the grey circle to pump, literally flies out of the pump and goes across the room. It's very aggravating trying to pump and having to put it back together every month minute.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Murata

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product at a great price! I actually spend less time pump with this than I do my electric one! Works great for raid trips or if you are flying and don't feel like packing your giant electric pump. Great for its price. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Ben & Katie Scheele

customer_reviews.title: Product started to grow mold after 3 washes. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Product started to grow mold after 3 washes. I always let it sit out before putting it back together but still got mold.
customer_reviews.author: Janali

customer_reviews.title: I tried multiple other hand pumps this was by far the best.
customer_reviews.text: I preferred​ this over any of the electric pumps I tried. Very effective. I tried multiple other hand pumps this was by far the best.
customer_reviews.author: Thegoodlifewife

customer_reviews.title: This product I really like it has great suction
customer_reviews.text: This product I really like it has great suction. After a week of using it the piece on the inside called the membrane ripped and I was unable to use it anymore. I contacted the company and they sent me a whole new pump in the mail and It has been several months and still works great.
customer_reviews.author: Kandace Lang

customer_reviews.title: One of my best baby-related purchases ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pump! I have never had any luck with any pumps before, neither manual nor electric. I've tried every major brand over the last four kids, and finally tried the NUK Expressive. I got more milk in 15 minutes than I ever have with any pump. I highly recommend this as a pump for anyone who wants occasional milk put away for outings or date nights.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: CRAP
customer_reviews.text: Suction stopped working in less than one month. Not worth the money, might as well buy a more expensive one that will be reliable
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great suction
customer_reviews.text: This manual pump is better than my electric breast pump.
customer_reviews.author: C n C Computers

customer_reviews.title: Does not work well and is painful. Skip it.
customer_reviews.text: Ouch, just ouch. Very painful to use, and poor sucking power.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Harper

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use- and perfect when traveling or out for ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use- and perfect when traveling or out for the day and don’t want to lug your electric pump around!
customer_reviews.author: bree

customer_reviews.title: Gave it a try
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little pump. I first started out using it but wasn't getting a whole lot of milk (probably just me) so I ending up getting an electric one. Id recommend this pump if you have a good production and also for traveling. I still have it just in case
customer_reviews.author: Haley R

customer_reviews.title: Worked great. Very difficult to get all the parts clean
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. Very difficult to get all the parts clean, so it got mold inside and had to toss the whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: jordanxjennifer

customer_reviews.title: not very easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: not very easy to clean, some of the corners are hard to reach even with a small brush. But very efficient as a pump, it increased my milk supply.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Good pump for the money
customer_reviews.text: Cost was my main motivating factor for purchasing this pump. I was pleasantly surprised. It was very comfortable and efficient. The only downside is the fact that it's not convenient to clean. Other than that, loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Engler

customer_reviews.title: Terrific product great value
customer_reviews.text: Great suction, easy to use, compact and minimal parts required Use it on the go, and I love it Great value for price!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Villada

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as an extra pump to carry in my diaper bag, because I kept forgetting my other one at home. Let me first say, it works, but there's better out there. It comes with a silicone insert, but it doesn't work if you use it, because air goes in between the insert and the flange. It is also loud, so if you are trying to be discreet, I would recommend a different one. It's also not very comfortable to use, and unlike others, you cannot completely take it apart, so Im not confident it's clean.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Fitch

customer_reviews.title: but it's the perfect thing when I'm at home and don't have my ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't seem to get more than 2 ounces at a time, but it's the perfect thing when I'm at home and don't have my double electric.
customer_reviews.author: Brad/Fran

product_meta.title: NUK Expressive Manual Breastpump
product_meta.description:
NUK EXPRESSIVE MANUAL BREAST PUMP
Breastfeeding is the most natural choice for feeding your baby, but it is not always convenient or possible. The NUK Expressive Manual Breast Pump is designed for occasional use when traveling away from home or as a back-up to your electric breast pump. It lets you control both suction and speed in order to customize your own level of personal comfort for efficient milk flow. The pump handle is ergonomically designed to minimize hand fatigue while pumping. The pump is also small, portable, and discreet for use anywhere at any time.

view larger view larger CUSTOMIZE YOUR SUCTION AND SPEED
Control the suction and speed that you need with easy, one-handed pumping. Press down faster on the handle to help promote let-down when you first start pumping, then change to slower presses on the handle after let-down to better mimic baby’s deep suckling once your breast milk is flowing.

MASSAGING BREAST CUSHION FOR LET-DOWN
The pump features a soft breast cushion with massaging rings for comfort. The shape of the cushion molds perfectly to the shape of your breast to help stimulate let-down and efficient flow of milk while pumping.

ERGONOMIC HANDLE FOR COMFORT
The ergonomic handle is designed to align closer to the milk collection bottle while pumping. This helps to minimize your hand fatigue and create a more comfortable experience while pumping with one hand.

MADE WITH FEW PARTS
The pump is easy to clean (hand wash or dishwasher) and assemble because it has few parts. To start pumping, just ensure the breast pump shield with valve is properly connected to the milk collection container.

WHAT’S IN THE BOX
 * One NUK Expressive Manual Breast Pump
 * 5oz Breast Milk Container with Silicone Nipple Size 1 (slow flow)
 * Collar, Cap, and Seal Disk for Storage
 * Container Stand, and Extra Silicone Valve

view larger AT A GLANCE
 * Customize the suction and speed
 * Soft, massaging breast cushion helps stimulate let-down
 * Ergonomic handle minimizes hand fatigue
 * Easy to clean (handwash or dishwash)
 * Only a few parts to assemble
 * Convenient, compact handheld design
 * BPA free
 * Assembled in USA
feature_bullets: Control the suction and speed you need with easy, one-handed pumping
Ergonomic handle helps to minimize hand fatigue
Skin-soft breast cushion for ultimate comfort
Lightweight to hold - weighs only 5.5 ounces
Few parts to assemble and clean
